Name: Zoning, 464 Ovington Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 250056 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 250056 ZMK (464 Ovington Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Geffen Management LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 22a, changing from an R3X District to an R6A District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 10, Council District 47.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
